title: What do you think about Justin Bieber? - Quora

response.answer_text: I know not everyone might agree, but for me, he’s the definition of mediocrity.  I mean, his songs aren’t bad, as far as commercial pop tunes go. They’re certainly catchy, they’re inoffensive, they do their job. But there’s nothing that really stands out about the guy, either, at least musically. His voice is pretty average, his music is indistinguishable from the litany of other songs on the radio written in nearly the exact same style, and he doesn’t have much lyrical content or context that would make his music interesting. I mean, say what you want about “Look What You Made Me Do” by Taylor Swift: the song might be an over-dramatic, cluttered mess, but at least it’s interesting. That’s not really something I can say about the Biebs, but again, some might disagree. For me, though, he’s the definition of mediocrity. (That’s at least better than what I could say about his earliest material…but that’s another story for another answer.)

I think his music sucks. A friend of mine worked for an outlet in which he did the engineering for broadcast & Justin was doing a spot for on T.V. He was promoting an album. There was a meet & greet afterwards. Justin was unhappy with the album & told these young kids not to buy the album. Justin, before hand at rehearsal was singing Led Zeppelin & other classics & was killing it. Truthfully, he doesn't want to do the music he's doing & he’s just doing it to have a career but, the music is sub par & is not what he is really good at. He should stick to rock & roll or another genre that he's better at & he would be much happier & have a wider net of fans.
